snippet.title: Fortune's Run Stealth Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! Here's a quick announcement of some of the new content which will be releasing in August, as aired on Zlimbratski's Indie FPS showcase. If you want a more detailed write-up of all the things, check Steam! We've got several posts on it ^^

https://steamcommunity.com/games/1692240/announcements/detail/4155213404196676730

See you all soon!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1692240/Fortunes_Run/
https://www.patreon.com/TeamFortune
https://twitter.com/FortunesRun
https://fortunes.run/
